RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 49. Claiming Purse 17100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXACTITUDE dueled on the early lead, shook clear on the turn, widened late while being ridden out and jumped a shadow near the wire while well clear. PATTI LOU broke in a tangle and trailed, angled out five wide in the stretch and finished well to be up for place. SHADY BABY had good position throughout and went evenly late. BACOPA BAY never far back, lacked a late bid. REYS PINA COLADA raced close up three wide for a half, then weakened. BUSYBEING FABULOUS vied for the lead from the rail and faltered late.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCORSESE had good position on the inside, rallied on the rail, closed determinedly and and edged clear late. OVER THE HILLS set the pace with a clear lead, held grudgingly in the stretch and just missed. REINSURE raced close up three wide early, rallied late and was gaining. NOT A GAME contended throughout and needed more late. STRIKE A BEAT was unhurried early and trailed, angled out five wide and closed a gap. EXONERATED PREZ never far back on the inside and was through after a half. GATTO MARRONE was no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 13800. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIME FOR CUPID was well placed early, rallied in the stretch three wide and drew clear late under strong handling. RECIPROCAL was bumped at the start, rushed to contention on the inside, gained a clear lead in the stretch but could not hold off the winner late. LORDHEARMYPRAYER allowed to settle earl, had a mild bid four wide while no threat. OLIVIA'S JOY broke outward at the start bumping RECIPOCAL raced inside and went evenly late. LANALIKESCHOOCHOOS set the pace four a half, then faltered. ASHWICKEN was no factor. ESPECIAL raced three wide and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOUGS MORNING PICK dueled three wide throughout, wore down rivals late and edged clear under strong handling. BEAT THE DEALER pressed early, dueled on the lead through the stretch while between horses and just missed. CHISELED JUSTICE dueled on the lead from the rail and held well after a long battle. TIDE RISING raced four wide and had mild bid. BLUE MONARCH was well placed and lacked a late bid. ONE CRAZY RIDE stumbled at the start and lost irons briefly, rushed up on the inside and tired in the stretch. PLATE IT UP was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I MATTER was allowed to settle early, rallied on the rail and drew off late under strong handling. LEMONSANDDIAMONDS pressed the pace, rallied in the stretch four wide, could not match strides late with the winner but was second best. NOGRATZ dueled on the lead until mid stretch and weakened late. SOULSTONE dueled on the lead until mid stretch, then faltered. FULL TIME STRUTIN was unhurried early and was no threat. TEST YOUR FAITH saved ground and was outrun. FRANCIA (PER) contended early and was through after a half.

Non-winners Of A Race Since February 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing

RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAINBOW SHIP pressed the pace, rallied in the stretch three wide and wore down rivals late under firm handling. HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE had good position early, rallied in the stretch on the inside and finished willingly. BOOGIE BOOGEE was well placed early, angled out four wide in the stretch and finished with good courage. DIVA POWER set the pace and dueled on the lead, weakened slightly late. BISCAYNE BAY allowed to settle, failed to menace. PENNY SHOTS was bumped start and was outrun. UPTOWN MILLIE was no factor.

Non-winners Of A Race Since February 8 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registere d Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COYOTE ROAD had good position throughout, rallied in mid stretch and drew clear late under firm handling. WAR NOVEL was away alertly and set the pace, remained clear in mid stretch and was caught late. ATLANTIC FIRESTORM raced mid pack early, rallied on the inside and finished willingly. CENTSOFWANDER was allowed to settle early, swung six wide in the stretch and closed a gap.. STORMIN'UNCLEJACK raced mid pack while four and went evenly. GOLD HERITAGE was allowed to settle early, angled in stretch and was no menace. CHROMED IMPULSE contended until mid stretch and weakened late.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LARRY'S ANGEL set the pace with a clear lead, led throughout and widened late under mild urging. DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT was allowed to settle early, rallied four wide and was second best. SEEYOUINMOTOWN raced wide early, angled in stretch and was best of the rest. MY PINK BUNNY TALE chased the winner and weakened in the stretch. OHIO LADY raced close up for a half, then faded. PRONTO CHARLI raced three wide and was no menace. BONNIE'S BEST contended on the inside and was through after a half. LADYBUGGIN was no menace. INCREDIBLE MARINI showed little and trailed.
